title: [slowdown] INFO  - Connection deserialization completed in 81484 ms
author: vndnua
body_snippet:
Something happened. The launch takes a long time. Saving confCons.xml also takes a long time.
The log file contains the line ‘INFO  - Connection deserialisation completed in 82947 ms.’

```
